DOC.brief_summary: This study plan conduct investigate effect adequate calcium intake Premenstrual Syndrome ( PMS ) symptom woman PMS inadequate calcium intake .
DOC.detailed_description: This study plan conduct investigate effect adequate calcium intake Premenstrual Syndrome ( PMS ) symptom woman PMS inadequate calcium intake . Thirty one woman , age 20-28 year , diagnose PMS suitable inclusion criterion , participate study . Participants allocate intervention ( n=16 ) control ( n=15 ) group randomly .
DOC.criteria: Women ; PMS inadequate calcium intake Regular menstrual cycle Menstrual flow occur every 22 35 day last three eight day Having metabolic disease Use oral contraceptive pill user vitamins mineral supplement smoker
